name: Google Drive Outbound Connector
description: Create folder or a file from template

properties.label: Bearer token
properties.description: Enter a valid Google API Bearer token

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: Enter Google API Client ID

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Enter Google API client Secret

properties.label: Refresh token
properties.description: Enter a valid Google API refresh token

properties.label: Parent folder ID
properties.description: Your resources will be created here. If left empty, a new resource will appear in the root folder

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Name of variable to store the response in

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation.

properties.label: Retries
properties.description: Number of retries

properties.label: Retry backoff
properties.description: ISO-8601 duration to wait between retries

name: Google Drive Outbound Connector
description: Create folder or a file from template

properties.label: Bearer token
properties.description: Enter Google API Bearer token that is authorized to interact with desired Drive

properties.label: Client ID
properties.description: Enter Google API Client ID

properties.label: Client secret
properties.description: Enter Google API client Secret

properties.label: Refresh token
properties.description: Enter Google API refresh token that is authorized to interact with desired Drive

properties.label: File name
properties.description: Enter name for your file

properties.label: Folder name
properties.description: Enter name for your folder

properties.label: Template ID
properties.description: Enter ID of the template you are creating a file from

properties.label: Parent folder ID
properties.description: Enter ID of the parent folder where new folder will be created

properties.label: Parent folder ID
properties.description: Enter ID of the parent folder where new file will be created

properties.label: Template variables
properties.description: Use this field to pass and update variables in your template as JSON

properties.label: Additional properties or metadata
properties.description: Use this field to pass additional Google Drive parameters as JSON.

properties.label: Result variable
properties.description: Enter name of variable to store the response in. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Result expression
properties.description: Expression to map the response into process variables. Details in the documentation

properties.label: Error expression
properties.description: Expression to handle errors. Details in the documentation
